page.title: 03A day in the life of Richard
page.content: A Day in the Life of Richard I get up at about 8.15 a.m. to eat my breakfast of shreddies. I have a cup of tea, when I am ready for school. My friends knock for me and we arrive at school at 8.55 a.m. School starts at 9.00 a.m. and we work until 10.30 a.m. We have playtime for 15 minutes. On Fridays at 11.00 a.m. the children of a particular class take assemly and parents come and watch them at noon we have dinner. We play until 1.05 p.m. and continue our work until 2.40 p.m. when we have a radio programme. At 3.05 p.m. we go home I normally play or watch television. At about 6.30 p.m. I have my tea. After I go to youth club at 7.15 p.m. Sometimes we have a disco, or play table tennis, snooker or pool, or go outside to play some games like rounders, football or run-outs.
